content: अर्थात् {%<ab>ind.</ab>%} (<ab>abl.</ab> of अर्थ) {@--1@} As a matter of course, of course, in fact; मूषिकेण दंडो भक्षित इत्यनेन तत्सहचरितमपूपभक्षणमर्थादायातं भवति <ls>S. D. 10.</ls> {@--2@} According to the circumstances or state of the case; as a matter of fact. {@--3@} That is to say, namely.
